title: 2016 Green Job Fair
desc: GREEN JOB FAIR & CAREER EXPO:? "Sustaining our Families, Community & Environment" We invite you to our Job Fair on  Friday, April 22, 2016 (9:00am to 1:00pm) , at historic St. George?s Church in downtown Flushing. ?Last year, more than 400 job seekers participated and connected with companies that serve our community and provide economic opportunities that sustain our families, communities, and environment. Experts from Solar1, Envirolution One, Workforce1, Green Earth Urban Gardens, GrowNYC, and Mega Power Savings will provide presentations and can advise you on career and training opportunities.
